variables.name: count_of_vm
variables.description: Number: Number of instances to build.
variables.query: How many instances of the vm do you want to build?

variables.name: linuxvm_base_name
variables.description: String: base name of resources allocated.
variables.query: What name would you like the vm names to be based on?

variables.name: linuxvm_vm_size
variables.description: String: size of vm to use.
variables.query: What size vm do you want to use?

variables.name: linuxvm_subnet
variables.description: String: name of subnet to use.
variables.query: Which subnet should the vm be added to?

variables.name: linuxvm_create_pip
variables.description: Boolean: Whether to create a public ip for the vm.
variables.query: Switch: create a public ip for each vm?

variables.name: include_azdo_ba
variables.description: Boolean: Whether to make the vm an azdo build agent. Depends on az cli.
variables.query: Switch: Add the Azure DevOps build agent code to the vm (true) or not (false)?

variables.name: azdo_agent_version
variables.description: String: Version number of agent software.
variables.query: What version of the Azure DevOps Agent code should be installed?

variables.name: azdo_pool_name
variables.description: String: name of build agent pool to join.
variables.query: Which previously existing Azure DevOps Agent Pool should the new agent be added to?

variables.name: azdo_build_agent_name
variables.description: String: base name of build agents.
variables.query: What name should the new build agents' names be based on?

variables.name: azdo_environment_demand_name
variables.description: String: Demand/capability of this agent.
variables.query: What capability demand should the new build agents respond to?

variables.name: include_openvpn
variables.description: Boolean: Whether to install OpenVPN Server. Depends on az cli. Must have a public IP.
variables.query: Switch: Install OpenVPN Server to the vm (true) or not (false)?

variables.name: storage_account_name
variables.description: String: Name of the storage account into which OpenVPN client config will be placed.
variables.query: Name of the storage account into which the OpenVPN client config will be placed?

variables.name: linuxvm_install_omsagent
variables.description: Boolean: Whether to install the OMS agent in the vm.
variables.query: Switch: Should the OMS agent be installed in the new vms?

variables.name: include_sonarqube_server
variables.description: Boolean: Whether to install sonarqube server in the vm.
variables.query: Switch: Add the SonarQube server to the vm (true) or not (false)?

variables.name: include_azcli
variables.description: Boolean: Whether to install AZ cli in the vm.
variables.query: Switch: Add the Az cli to the vm (true) or not (false)?

variables.name: include_nexus
variables.description: Boolean: Whether to install Nexus Repository in the vm.
variables.query: Switch: Add the Nexus Repository Manager (community edition) to the vm (true) or not (false)?

variables.name: include_docker
variables.description: Boolean: Whether to install Docker in the vm.
variables.query: Switch: Add Docker CE to the vm (true) or not (false)?

variables.name: include_pwsh
variables.description: Boolean: Whether to install PowerShell for Linux in the vm.
variables.query: Switch: Add PowerShell for Linux to the vm (true) or not (false)?

variables.name: include_packer
variables.description: Boolean: Whether to install Packer in the vm.
variables.query: Switch: Add Hashicorp's Packer to the vm (true) or not (false)?

variables.name: include_dotnetsdk
variables.description: Boolean: Whether to install the .NET SDK in the vm.
variables.query: Switch: Add the .NET SDK to the vm (true) or not (false)?

variables.name: include_maven
variables.description: Boolean: Whether to install Java and Maven in the vm.
variables.query: Switch: Add Java and Maven to the vm (true) or not (false)?

variables.name: include_terraform
variables.description: Boolean: Whether to install terraform in the vm.
variables.query: Switch: Add the Terraform cli to the vm (true) or not (false)?

variables.name: terraform_version
variables.description: String: Version number of terraform software.
variables.query: What version of the Terraform cli should be installed?
